animepahe.latestRelease.description: Recently released content, can be new or old anime, its just new to the site

animepahe.season.description: TV show/series season eg. Season 5 of The Flash

animepahe.special.description: A type of related content; a special release episode not included in the original release often with differing style

animepahe.timeSeason.description: Time Season eg. The season is now Winter
